content: Thanks for sharing your candid thoughts. SnapChat is an amazing story worth a movie deal. Go L.A. Tech! Their evolution from quick sex pic’s to news worthy content has established them as a go to app for the youth and some seasoned adults. It’s an awesome product w/ unique technologies, but, “2 reasons you might not want to buy Snapchat when it IPOs” http://www.businessinsider.com/2-reasons-you-might-not-want-to-buy-snapchat-when-it-ipos-2017-2
